# AGEPRO Reference Manual Quatro Book Prototype

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

Source code repository for the [Quatro Book](https://quarto.org/docs/books/) prototype version of Jon Brodziak's *AGEPRO Reference Manual.*

Note: This manual documents devevloping changes to Auxiliary Ouptut Files option to the future AGEPRO update.

**If you using AGEPRO for production, please use:**

-   [Jon Brodziak's original AGEPRO program (source code)](https://github.com/PIFSCstockassessments/AGEPRO)
-   [GUI interface for AGEPRO (installer & source)](https://github.com/PIFSCstockassessments/AGEPRO-GUI)
